body.name: MONDAY HAIRCARE Volume Conditioner 12oz for Thin, Fine, and Oily Hair, Made from Coconut Oil, Ginger Extract, & Vitamin E, 100% Recyclable Bottles (354ml), PINK (10436)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 39 mins
features: VOLUME CONDITIONER: This award-winning formula helps lightly hydrate and balance thin, fine and oily hair types. It contains Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Provitamin B5 to leave hair feeling full and invigorated.

SALON-QUALITY: Our modern formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. We instead use natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein and vitamin E to nourish and restore.

AWARD-WINNING: Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has 11 major beauty awards and counting, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.

100% RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do our little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill. A win for your hair and for the environment.
body.description: MONDAY HAIRCARE VOLUME Conditioner for women is good for oily hair, hair with product build-up and thin and fine hair types. It’s also safe for color-treated hair. This invigorating and lightly hydrating Conditioner helps to balance hair with Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Provitamin B5—ingredients that help support hair health and maintain normal hair growth and thickness. For best results, use with MONDAY HAIRCARE VOLUME Shampoo. MONDAY HAIRCARE’s salon-quality Shampoo and Conditioner formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. They instead contain premium natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein, vitamin E and provitamin B5 to nourish and restore. Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has close to a dozen major beauty awards, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award. MONDAY has also been featured by Vogue, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Allure, Refinery29 and Byrdie. All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals. Our pink bottles are also made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars happy with it
reviews.reviewText: Have been using it for a couple of months and my doesn't look greasy the first day any more so I will keep using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: smell delicious! not really volumizing thou

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price good for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: I have fine hair with a tendency to get oily, and this conditioner works great and that it does not make my hair overweighted. The bottle size is great for the price. The only reason I gave it one less star is because I noticed it doesn’t work that well if your hair is damaged or dyed. It gives just enough moisture, but it doesn’t feel that conditioned or healthier but I do like that it doesn’t make my hair greasy. There is a very light fragrance that is not noticeable and great for sensitive noses. Of course the bottle is cute overall I think it’s a great by and probably better if you have healthy natural hair, it will work great for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes perfectly with the shampoo…
reviews.reviewText: I only condition my length, because my roots are greasy. But this is incredibly moisturizing and gives my that silky slip I want from a conditioner. It also doesn’t weigh my hair down. Both the shampoo and conditioner are perfect and have quickly become my favorites. I have fine hair, greasy roots, dry length, color treated hair, and this works perfectly for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I was expecting a lot more from this conditioner. I found I had to use a lot more and leave it on for a lot longer to achieve a similar effect to what I was using. I'll use it up, but won't buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LIFE CHANGING HAIR CARE
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is my go to conditioner. I have used all name brands and salon specialty conditioners for my hair. My mother is a hairdresser and even she agrees that this conditioner is amazing for dry, curly hair. This conditioner not only works miracles on my frizzy, dry, curly hair but it is extremely affordable compared to products like It's a 10, Nexxus, etc. This conditioner changed my life and hair care game!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bottle was covered in something brown and appeared to have been used.
reviews.reviewText: Bottle was covered in something brown. The cap was already turned appearing to have been used already and bottle was not full. Not like how they are when purchased in store.
